if(WIN32)
	list(APPEND INC
		../glog/src/windows
	)
else()
	list(APPEND INC
		../glog/src
	)
endif()

add_definitions(${GFLAGS_DEFINES})
add_definitions(${GLOG_DEFINES})
add_definitions(${CERES_DEFINES})

add_definitions(
	-DCERES_HAVE_PTHREAD
	-DCERES_NO_SUITESPARSE
	-DCERES_NO_CXSPARSE
	-DCERES_NO_LAPACK
	-DCERES_HAVE_RWLOCK
)

if(WITH_OPENMP)
	add_definitions(
		-DCERES_USE_OPENMP
	)
endif()

blender_add_lib(extern_ceres "${SRC}" "${INC}" "${INC_SYS}")
